title: FS: Hayden SGC 3 & Mullaney SL PSA 1 OM Back
author: Scott L.

posts.post_title: FS: Hayden SGC 3 & Mullaney SL PSA 1 OM Back
posts.post_content:
Hayden SOLD
Mullaney SOLD
delivered PayPal F&F. 

I’ll take it trumps offers. Thanks. Scott

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48492082992_e32691faf1_z_d.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48492500621_dfefdbfe0f_z_d.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48492672592_84160780b8_z_d.jpg[/IMG]
Scott is that scuffing on the case front or a reflection? Can we see the back?

Randy that white spot in his collar is a small chip, not a reflection. If it was something else you were asking about there is nothing on the case it’s my reflection. Here is the back. It’s really clean and bold. Thanks. 

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48492307371_6b681dc3d8_z_d.jpg[/IMG]
